flavorText: "Do not mistake tranquility for domestication. This land is wild, and will always remain so."

foreignData.flavorText: 「のどかだからといって自分の庭と取り違えてはならない。この地は険しく、今後もそうであり続ける。」

name: Bamboo Grove Archer
originalText:
Defender, reach
Channel — {4}{G}, Discard Bamboo Grove Archer: Destroy target creature with flying.

rulings.text: Discarding the card is part of the cost to activate a channel ability.
If a channel ability requires a target, you may not activate it without a target just to discard the card.

text:
Defender, reach
Channel — {4}{G}, Discard Bamboo Grove Archer: Destroy target creature with flying.
